Title: 不均一系水素触媒反応器
Abstract: A power system comprises: (i) a chemical fuel mixture comprising at least two components chosen from: a catalyst or source of catalyst, atomic hydrogen or a source of atomic hydrogen, reactants to form the catalyst or the source of catalyst and atomic hydrogen or a source of atomic hydrogen, one or more reactants to initiate the catalysis of atomic hydrogen, and a support to enable the catalysis; (ii) at least one thermal system for reversing an exchange reaction to thermally regenerate the fuel from the reaction products comprising a plurality of reaction vessels; (iii) a heat sink that accepts the heat from the power-producing reaction vessels across a thermal barrier; and (iv) a power conversion system.
